title: Ebro In The Morning - Happy Birthday Rosenberg  + Skate Legends Large Professor & Jeremy Elkin
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 7/23. 

Skate Legends Large Professor & Jeremy Elkin stop by the show to promote "All the Streets Are Silent."

Ebro and the crew discuss the new Kanye, Laura Stylez has her patented Flashing Lights segments (10 & 43:30), and you find out who played themselves. 

Please like and subscribe to Ebro In The Morning.

SUMMER JAM PODCAST GIVEAWAY RULES: 

Giveaway Rules: Once a week, we will be giving away two pairs of Summer Jam tickets on the Ebro In The Morning Podcast - to enter the contest, the listener must do 3 things:

1. screenshot the podcast app while the contest ad is playing 

2. Follow @EBROINTHEAM& Tweet the screenshot to @Ebrointheam along with why you want to go to Summer Jam - best reason wins

3. Include the hashtag Summer Jam - #SummerJam

4. Winners will be announced on the Monday podcast episode.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
